parameters.name: Duration
parameters.description: The renewal period of the resource plan.

parameters.name: EffectiveDate
parameters.description:
The time when the resource plan takes effect. If you leave this parameter empty, the resource plan immediately takes effect by default.

Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource plan.

parameters.name: PricingCycle
parameters.description:
The unit of the validity period for the resource plan. Valid values:

*   Month
*   Year

Default value: Month.
